name: Vegan Peanut Butter Cake with Chocolate Peanut Butter Glaze
description: 7 Ingredient Peanut Butter Cake with Chocolate Peanut Butter Glaze. Easy Blender Cake. Vegan Recipe. Makes a 9 by 9 inch brownie pan or small baking sheet (9.5 by 13)
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup coconut sugar or other vegan sugar (, 2 tbsp more for sweeter)
1/2 cup heaped smooth nut butter (- peanut, almond or cashew butter)
2 cups flour ((I use 1 cup whole wheat or spelt + 1 cup unbleached all purpose))

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc. Line or grease a brownie pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc. Line or grease a brownie pan.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add non dairy milk, sugar, maple, vanilla, nut butter and oil and blend until the sugar and nut butter are mixed in.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, add non dairy milk, sugar, maple, vanilla, nut butter and oil and blend until the sugar and nut butter are mixed in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flours, baking powder, baking soda, salt and pulse for 2 to 3 seconds, Pulse twice to combine well into a smooth batter. Alternatively, combine the flours, baking powder, baking soda and salt in a bowl and pour the blended nut butter milk mixture into the bowl. Mix to make a smooth batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flours, baking powder, baking soda, salt and pulse for 2 to 3 seconds, Pulse twice to combine well into a smooth batter. Alternatively, combine the flours, baking powder, baking soda and salt in a bowl and pour the blended nut butter milk mixture into the bowl. Mix to make a smooth batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the batter in the prepared pan. Tap to even it out.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the batter in the prepared pan. Tap to even it out.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 21 to 24 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 21 to 24 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 10 minutes, then remove from the pan and cool on the wire rack for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 10 minutes, then remove from the pan and cool on the wire rack for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the glaze: Combine the chocolate non dairy milk, coconut oil in a saucepan over medium low heat. Stir frequently until most of the chocolate starts melting. Take off heat and stir until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the glaze: Combine the chocolate non dairy milk, coconut oil in a saucepan over medium low heat. Stir frequently until most of the chocolate starts melting. Take off heat and stir until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the nut butter to the warm hot mixture and mix to combine until smooth. It will take a minute to mix in, depends on the nut butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the nut butter to the warm hot mixture and mix to combine until smooth. It will take a minute to mix in, depends on the nut butter.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour over the cake and spread using a spatula. Garnish with shaved chocolate or cocoa powder or coconut. Cool for 10 minutes. Then slice and serve with a cup of hot chocolate.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour over the cake and spread using a spatula. Garnish with shaved chocolate or cocoa powder or coconut. Cool for 10 minutes. Then slice and serve with a cup of hot chocolate.
